name: Microsoft PowerPoint Add-in
summary: Learn about .PPA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Examples of add-ins include timeline creators, tools that insert professional images, presentation to HTML56 converters, and slide to eLearning content converters. PowerPoint add-ins for PowerPoint 2013 to 365 should be located in the following directories, by default:

instructions: You can open PPA files with Microsoft PowerPoint in Windows and macOS. To open a PPA file with PowerPoint 365, select File → Open → Browse, then choose "PowerPoint Add-ins (*.ppam;*.ppa)" from the format dropdown menu.
To manage your add-ins in PowerPoint 365, select File → Options → Add-ins.
